column4: I upgraded my firmware so that I could put a stop to the maximum bandwidth usage my roommates use for limewire
Unfortunately, the linksys firmware does not allow me to do that without blocking it alltogether
sorry, but it doesn't sound like a Ubuntu problem. Try a different version of the firmware? Yours sounds broken. Port forwarding should just work, it's pretty damn basic
I'll try that. Do you know of any rooms that I can join for specific help with this stuff?
